channel.title: How do i connect to a server?
channel.description:
hi, how can i connect to a server? always if i try to connect it says that the server is online but in the list its online how can i change that? ty for ur helps
and sorry is this is in a wrong thread because im new here

item.title: How do i connect to a server?
item.dc:creator: @zero159 zero159
item.description:
@zero159 wrote:

this happens to me to, i want to join my own server but it shuts me off after about 10 mins and i cant do anything.

I also can not conect to any other servers, and im using hamachi and no-ip

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to a server?

item.title: How do i connect to a server?
item.dc:creator: @iqhacker iqhacker
item.description:
@iqhacker wrote:

Umm…

Let’s go through the basics…

So when you start up the client, and it says, Start Server, and Enter Now, what did you do?
You have to start the server first…

If you are connecting to server that is not on your own server, you need to enter in that ip of the computer you are connecting to.

If you are connecting to your own server, then in the ip field type: 127.0.0.1

Tell me how this goes…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to a server?

thats the problem,if i do that it still wont connect
